content: > **please note ** this pattern is free to > view in its entirety on my blog this > ad-free downloadable pdf enables me to > be able to bring you more free > patterns in the future go to the free pattern here 1 **description ** just like the granny square the chevron has to be one of the most classic and iconic crochet blanket designs and with good reason - the valleys and peaks of the design are eye-catching and draw the viewer into the stitch work of the blanket and with the colorful chevrons blanket i wanted to build on the iconic look with a bit of an update this blanket is done in basic crochet stitches single_crochet and half_double_crochet but in a variety of ways to add texture while the 2 colors create stripes to really highlight the classic chevron look settle in to the rhythm of this design and watch as the blanket builds and keeps you cozy this pdf includes the written instructions and color photos the sample for this was in pound of love by lion brand yarn 2 affiliate link in the colors elephant gray and cascade you can pick up the kit for this pattern by lion brand here 3 you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2023 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns please contact info@divinedebris com 1 https //divinedebris com/free-colorful-chevrons-blanket-crochet-pattern-by-divine-debris/ 2 https //shrsl com/4cx83 3 https //shrsl com/4cyax
